IBM Data Merge Utility

A template based transformation and enrichment utility

See: Description

Packages 
Package Description
com.ibm.util.merge
The primary interface to the merge utility.
com.ibm.util.merge.data
The DataManager class that provides path-based access to an abstract Object Data structure.
com.ibm.util.merge.data.parser
The primary DataProxy interface and default implementations
com.ibm.util.merge.data.parser.gson
GSON based custom Template serializer / deserializer
com.ibm.util.merge.exception
Exceptions for IDMU
com.ibm.util.merge.storage
Responsible for managing archives generated by the Merge process
com.ibm.util.merge.template
The Template object (the heart of the IDMU Merge Process)
com.ibm.util.merge.template.content
Template Content is the optimized search/replace/insert framework for content.
com.ibm.util.merge.template.directive
Directives that implement the logic of the merge process.
com.ibm.util.merge.template.directive.enrich.provider
The Enrich Provider interface and default implementations

A template based transformation and enrichment utility

Usage


        // Optionally initialize a configuration
        Config.load(from Env, String, File or URL)
          
        // Create a template cache
        TemplateCache cache = new TemplateCache();
        
        // Get a Merger for your template
        Merger merger = new Merger(cache, "some.template.name");
          
        // Merge the template and get the merged template
        Template template = merger.merge();
         
        // Do something with the output
        template.getMergedOutput().getValue() - as a string
        template.getMergedOutput().streamOutput(stream) - as an output stream
